data.text: @WPLGLocal10 And doctors, not the CDC/Biden, should decide whether to prescribe Ivermectin to their patients, right?  See how this works?
@WPLGLocal10 I’d like to see this guys birth certificate. Thanks

@WPLGLocal10 I dont understand why you people are losing your shit over this.  Florida is "recommending" not forcing.  It is recommended to get flu shot every year, recom to get 8 hours sleep, recom to wax your car once year etc.. do people do it NO!!
@WPLGLocal10 Your “expert” should debate Ladapo on the subject.

@WPLGLocal10 Why r u being so dishonest? There were over 100 MD's involved in this and 5 more on the panel. Btw, they r following the science.....just like Sweden and the UK are doing. The vaccine has almost ZERO benefit for young children and has ZERO long term studies. Why take the chance?
@WPLGLocal10 the thing is he is not banning just making a recommendation so if you and your pediatrician make a different decision you can do what you want.  No one said you can't, seriously people
